General.Name: Fine Blanking & Tool Co Ltd
General.Description: Fine Blanking & Tool Co., Ltd produces and sells car and motorcycle parts in Taiwan. The company's primary products include precision stamping products, locomotive and bicycle disc brakes, car seat recliners, car hand brake parts, car safety hook and loop, and automobile and motorcycle seats. It also provides tubes, seat belt reels, tongues, recliner, tappet and shims, frames for airbag, hand brakes, blanking gears, sectors and latches, side stand, seat assembly, foot support and rest, saddles, handle bar and clamps, triple clamps, one way, ABS phonic wheels, slope plates, bicycle parts, and engine gears and other high precision metal components. In addition, the company offers clutch and gas brake pedal, RAEV, push and pull mechanism, steering assembly, and rack and pinion, as well as medical equipment, sporting goods, and computer parts. Fine Blanking & Tool Co., Ltd was founded in 1977 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
General.Address: NO.3, KON Eighth Rd., Changhua, Taiwan
